Package ev3dev.sensors.slamtec.service

Low level Serial port development with the sensor RPLidarA1.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RpLidarListener
    Listener for client of RpLidarLowLevelDriver
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GrowQueue_I32
    This is a queue that is composed of integers.
    RpLidarDeviceInfo
    Contains information about the device
    RpLidarHeath
    Packet which describes the sensor's health
    RpLidarHighLevelDriver
    High level task which performs intelligent filtering to remove bad data and correctly starts up the sensor
    RpLidarLowLevelDriver
    Low level service for RPLidar.
    RpLidarMeasurement
    Single measurement from LIDAR
    RpLidarScan
    Storage for a complete scan

Package ev3dev.sensors.slamtec.service Description

Low level Serial port development with the sensor RPLidarA1. A fork from the development by Peter Abeles
